metadata.synopsis: This PAD is played when the player character finally returns from the jungle after being teleported there by the circus djinni.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A,oe WYR_Circus_TestJungle,ctrl+T to the portal and click on it to get back.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I'm back - and in one piece. Now, where is that djinni?
0.context: NodeContext: Gale: djinni-sore / dinosaur pun - we just escaped from dinosaurs
